message: I keep clicking to bring down the dropdown, when I get a notification, and it takes me to the group browsing page instead of to the content for the latest notification.  Yes, user error, but . . . change it.
Yes, do this, i had the same problem
I've done that before also. But then, if you disable the click-through to the "Your Groups," page, how do you propose people get to that page?
I think clicking the arrow shouldn't bring you to the groups page, but clicking the rest of the button should.
